name: ALT_BPA_PRL_SS_FUP
description: Protocols/SmartSets (PRL) SmartSet and Order Set follow-up actions taken.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) for this contact.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_ACT_PRL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the SmartSet (a collection of orders and other clinical content) to place from this alert.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_ACT_PRL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.
